name: UnofficialMagic8Ball
0:
”Alexa, Open Eight Ball”
”Eight Ball, should I wear the blue shirt today?”
”Stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eight ball
des:
Can't decide or don't know? Ask the unofficial Magic 8 Ball!!! Ask 8 Ball a question and see if it predicts a positive or negative outlook.

E.g. 
"Hi Eight Ball, should I call her?" 
"Eight Ball, do you think she'll say yes?"
"Help Eight Ball, should I wear the blue shirt tonight?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
